## InvSqrtNode class

Computes the inverse square root

**Signature:**

```typescript
declare class InvSqrtNode extends GenericMathNode 
```
**Extends:** [GenericMathNode](doc/markdown/./scene.genericmathnode.md)

## Remarks

Returns 1/âˆšx for x &gt; 0. Often more efficient than computing sqrt then dividing. Supports scalar and vector inputs (component-wise for vectors).
